attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paddys Market In Glasgow has been in the News Papers Over the Years Good And Bad.But When I was told it was being closed down by the Glasgow City Council.And the Landlords are Network Rail.Which is all Public owned.Paddys Market is well been helping Peole from all parts of the world right down too the poor person.And really The Market is For items where you can lay the items down for sale.PLS SAVE PADDYS MARKET.As its Only got till 2009.Then it will be turned in to a Arts Or something or nothing.Next it will be The Barrars A other Glasgow Market Which will be next.Sign the Petition before its too late As You can help by letting the PM understand and Stop this madnest Your Declan From The Gorbals .Glasgow City..

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
